001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
008import android.widget.ImageView;
009import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
010import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.databinding.ItemGuessesBinding;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.Guess;
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.Map;
016
017public class GuessesAdapter extends ArrayAdapter<Guess> {
018
019  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
020  private final Map<Integer, String> colorNameLookup;
021  private final Map<Integer, Integer> colorValueLookup;
022
023  public GuessesAdapter(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull List<Guess> guesses,
024      Map<Integer, String> colorNameLookup, Map<Integer, Integer> colorValueLookup) {
025    super(context, R.layout.item_guesses, guesses);
026    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
027    this.colorNameLookup = colorNameLookup;
028    this.colorValueLookup = colorValueLookup;
029  }
030
031  @NonNull
032  @Override
033  public View getView(int position, @Nullable View convertView, @NonNull ViewGroup parent) {
034    ItemGuessesBinding binding = (convertView == null)
035        ? ItemGuessesBinding.inflate(inflater, parent, false)
036        : ItemGuessesBinding.bind(convertView);
037    
038    binding.guess.removeAllViews();
039    Guess guess = getItem(position);
040    guess.getContent()
041        .codePoints()
042            .forEach((codePoint) -> {
043              ImageView swatch =
044                  (ImageView) inflater.inflate(R.layout.item_guess_chars, binding.guess, false);
045              swatch.setContentDescription(colorNameLookup.get(codePoint));
046              //noinspection DataFlowIssue
047              swatch.setColorFilter(colorValueLookup.get(codePoint));
048              binding.guess.addView(swatch);
049            });
050
051    binding.correct.setText(String.valueOf(guess.getCorrect()));
052    binding.close.setText(String.valueOf(guess.getClose()));
053
054    return binding.getRoot();
055  }
056}
